oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Conventional culture, MALDI-TOF and 165 rRNA compared for agreement in diagnosis of bovine mastitis pathogens
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Wilson, David J.
Middleton, John
Adkins, Pamela
Goodell, Gregory M.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: mastitis
pathogen
testing
bovine milk
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Tests for bacterial mastitis pathogens include those in use for some time and some that have only become available recently. The objective of this study was blind comparison of culture, matrix assisted laser desorption ionization - time offlight (MALDI-TOF), and 16S rRNA genomic sequencing for test agreement in identification of mastitis pathogens from bovine milk.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2018; 294
